873630.name: Fantasy Grounds - Quests of Doom 4: Awakenings (5E)
873630.description:
Awakenings by Steve Winter

Awakenings is an adventure intended for characters from 1st to 3rd level.
The adventure starts the night a meteor streaks overhead. This heralds events that plunge the characters into a fairy tale (talking, anthropomorphic animals) tinged with elements of cosmic horror (a malignant alien intelligence from the stars).
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Team Twohy LLC
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
